Also if I’m right if you don’t buy spacers for mk4 modules from \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eSDS\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Swerve Drive Specialties\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, they say that it is ok to cut the shafts into length. So if you want to switch from neos to falcons you should do it. The performance difference is noticeable and also the integrated motor controller helps the electrical because less wires are
